data.text: @SenayKenfe @kanyewest Raul Grijalva Andrew Deeney @Ocasio2018  are advocating beyond the notion of now normalised democratic socialism As they are promotic self raising power and not pacifying a generation due to political correctness

@kyless2u @kanyewest Rising socialist like who? Lol people use that word to label themselves but believe in the same platform as regular Democrats. Healthcare isn't the only thing socialists should be advocating for
@SenayKenfe @kanyewest I see you, but what about rising socialist tide on the left. The left actually being left and with that more Black representatives in office
@kyless2u @kanyewest The rise of these formerly "fringe" right wing parties suggests otherwise.

@SenayKenfe @kanyewest Completely agree in theory, however since we do not have 1st to the pole style Government (IE UK/Canadian Parliament) its better to take on a morph the Dem Party instead of creating a new 1 that would take 70 years to make impact. The world needs immediate change from this regime
@kyless2u @kanyewest I think we need to establish independence from both major parties as our needs are not being prioritized
@SenayKenfe @kanyewest I just clicked that hashtag damn that was funny as hell

@SenayKenfe @kanyewest So let’s converse. I understand the ideology behind our people needing to realign ourselves. However in this current political climate do you not feel that we need to establish balance. Then attack our on personal norms?
